data.text: @ABCWorldNews @JamesAALongman He didn't even attend her first wedding so I don't see what the fuss is about. He clearly has his issues and does not care about his daughter, yet wants to clear his reputation.  She needs to live her life and just keep it moving.

@ABCWorldNews @JamesAALongman The daughter went more out of her way 2 accommodate the mother, than reaching out 2 the dad pleading 2give her way. My father feared flying, & I had refused 2marry unless he found the courage 2 fly, & he had the the best time of his life. I wanted him 2 confront his fears. R.I.P.
@AngelCruz66 @ABCWorldNews @JamesAALongman I don’t even think this belongs on World News Tonight! I don’t think my children gain anything from watching this!
@ABCWorldNews @JamesAALongman Why is this newsworthy? Why was this topic the 4th report tonight???
